content: a ribbing pattern end sock with a shell edging 5 double_crochet in next stitch skip stitch single_crochet in next stitch skip stitch and continue shell pattern around finish off and weave in end for heel single_crochet in corner area of heel and in each half_double_crochet and chain around beginning with second round decrease in each corner stitch and continue with a single_crochet in each single_crochet around until heel fits foot turn sock inside out and slip_stitch remaining stitches close fo and weave in end copyright woven and spun 2005 this design belongs to woven~n~spun this design may not be reproduced or transmitted to others without the express written permission of woven~n~spun items may be made from this pattern and sold or given away but the pattern itself may not be sold to other
